example.text: Maryland is one of nine states in the country with more than 1,000 prisoners who were sentenced as children — and of those prisoners, 90% are people of color. Shame on us if we don't step up to break this pipeline, support community programs, and right this awful wrong. [[url]]

Lastly, I'd like to wish you happy holidays from all of the Trone family and Team Trone! I'm honored to be able to serve Maryland's Sixth District, and I won't stop fighting for bipartisan, effective solutions - you can count on it.

[[user]] For me, it was a no-brainer to request $975,000 in #CommunityProjectFunding to help Good Will Fire Company receive a new engine tanker. Once this funding is secured, the new tanker will help keep our communities and first responders safe. That's the #1 priority — always. [[url]]

American families are depending on us to pay our bills on time — just as they do every single month. But as our nation is on the brink of an economic tailspin, Republicans are headed to the airport. Shame on them. [[url]]

I had a great time visiting I Believe in Me, a youth organization focused on peer mentorship and expanding educational opportunities. That's why I'm working to secure $3 million to help them build the future Hope Center and triple the number of kids benefiting from this program. [[url]]

Introduced Legislation to Lower Gas Prices For nearly a year, Americans have suffered from Putin's unprovoked war in Ukraine. We need to establish long-term strategies to keep these conflicts away from our local economies and protect Americans' wallets.

Today I introduced the OPIOIDS Act with [[user]] to improve data collection and surveillance related to opioid overdoses. This epidemic has taken too many lives already, so we must ensure our first responders and forensic laboratories are better prepared.
